title: [Self-directed] Blended Learning-Based Film Production Education for Enhancing Cinematic Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic video production tools and understanding of media grammar
context.additional_context: Practical skill-centered environments using digital devices, enhancing audiovisual communication competencies linked to language curricula.

learning_goals: Students can explain fundamental principles of visual language (shot composition, editing, narrative structure) through the filmmaking process
Learners can produce a 3-minute short film using VR simulations and actual filming equipment in a blended learning environment
Participants can analyze whether the produced video content meets the narrative structure and visual expression elements required in language education through summative assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
